content.detailedDescription: I am a delivery driver one day when my dad and i were done delivering to a store which was walmart in dinuba ca. we went out thru the back of the store or the receiving side we had got to the store a little later than usual so when we finished, there was no other vendors in  the back lot but us my dad and i were talking when something caught my eye when i turned i saw what looked like a metal ball a perfect sphere around 20feet in diameter you could see the sun reflecting off it my dad and i were just starring at this object in disbelief i had never in my life saw anything like it the object was in the air perfectly still for around 10seconds i was waiting for this thing to shoot off or do something when all of the sudden it started getting smaller and smaller til it disappeared when it was over my dad and i looked at each other and could not believe what we had just witnessed.
content.summary: Silver color sphere appeared out of nowhere and disappeared in the way that it just got smaller til it was gone

content.detailedDescription: Was outside with my mother attempting to witness the taurid meteor shower. we thought we spotted a satellite as there is not a lot of light pollution in the area of our residence. however, we shortly began to notice that there were five other similar objects following the first one with a decent amount of space between them. within a few minutes, more and more of these objects appeared from the horizon of ene, mostly appearing with only one other object in a formation of sort. as these objects slowly moved they began to become more irrational as time passed. these objects began to make erratic movements while staying in formation and following the flight path. there were a few single objects and shaped formations as big as 10 of these objects, one of which looked like a box with a tail. these objects frequently changed colors colors, and combined formations all while staying on the same path towards what seemed to be the wnw.
content.summary: 100+ starlight objects moving in formation towards same direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was dropping a friend off to his house when both of us noticed a bright star like light hovering. i had assumed that it was a weather balloon but as i drove back the hovering object seemed to move in irradical patterns. the object seemed like it was emitting a strange light that had me awestruck at the sight of it so much that i had lost focus driving and almost hit a deer. i have since then researched any other rational explanations and can't find one suitable to explain the occurance. the object looked as if it was just 600 yards away and i could see it as i was traveling to my house just 4 miles away. the object freaked me out too much to keep track of.
content.summary: Bright hovering star like light lower than stars hovered and seemed to follow my car

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were pulling into our driveway and the sun was blinding his turn into the gate. he looked up to move the visor or position to see and that's when he spotted the ufo. he pointed it out to me and i could not believe my eyes. he pulled in. we both got out of the car with our bags in hand i dug for my cell phone and snapped four pictures of it. it was huge, so bright and shiny. it was round / circular with the dome shape on top. we just stood there and starred at it for about a minute and a half as it hovered, not believing what we were seeing, but we were indeed seeing it. my reaction the whole time was; am i really looking at a space ship right now. my dad went inside to grab something and his girlfriend so she could come out and see it. i ran up to the porch thru everything i had down on the bench and ran back out to the fence. i was in such a hurry i had dropped my cell phone down with everything else or i would of taken more pictures or recorded what i saw next. just as i got out to the fence, it either changed shape or moved into a much thinner longer shape and starting moving nw. i watched it until i could no longer see it anymore in the distance. it kept it's bright luminous glow the whole way. it was about 10 seconds that is took for it to no longer be in my sight once it started moving. my dad and his girlfriend did not make it out in time to see it's journey through the sky. i will never forget it. we are anxiously awaiting your comments on this ufo. i downloaded the pictures from by samsung galaxy 4 to my laptop. the first picture attached is one of four i have. the other three close up's are taken with my olympus camera from my laptop screen that is zoomed in on the ufo.
content.summary: Huge ufo caught on camera hovering in sky at sunset then flew away in bullhead city arizona nov. 5 2015

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on vacation in scottsdale, az, and traveled to sedona for the day.  we took many photos from our cell phones (16mb camera) when there.  a few days ago we copied the photos to our computer, and on the larger screen were able to notice what looks to us like a saucer shaped ufo above the mountain in the attached photo.  my wife took the photo.  i took the same view / photo within a minute later, mine is stamped 3:30 pm (local time) and the object cannot be seen.  we are pretty certain there was not any debris on the camera lens, we’ve never had debris on any of our photos and have taken thousands.  this is a recognizable mountain in the area, but i can’t tell you exactly where we were, or which way we were facing.  i really wish i had geo-tagging turned on when the photo was taken!
content.summary: Apparent ufo seen in photo - over a mountain in sedona, az

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were on my back deck looking at the stars, which were unusually clear for denver...Completely cloudless night. i had just pointed out a constellation and said "that's the little dipper, isn't it?" and he said "i think so", and then all of a sudden this huge shape appeared just to the left of the dipper. i'm still a bit in shock, but it's burnt into my memory: it was a chevron-shaped object, with 5 "lights"...I put this in quotes because they weren't really lights...More like skylights...Or portholes? not sure, but the amount of light they emitted allowed us to see the outline of the object clearly enough for us to both say, wtf is that?? my first thought and i said to my companion was that it looked like planes flying in formation, but it was so large and close, and made no noise at all, we quickly realized that wasn't it. it appeared and then moved pretty quickly to the west at an even pace, and then my dog tripped the security light, preventing us from seeing where it went, in the end. we both believe the amount of time we watched it was 8-10 very long seconds. this thing was big, real and completely soundless.  neither of us are believers one way or the other, but honestly, this is really hard to explain, not to mention believe. thank goodness there were two of us.  we find it so difficult to believe that no one else saw this, but it was fast...If you saw it too, please respond!  i feel a little nutty here...

this happened at approx 10 pm in denver, mst.
content.summary: A boomerang shaped, very large moving object that i can't explain

content.detailedDescription: At 7 o'clock i was watching the skies and noticed 5 plane like objectsome 3 in triangle form heading from southeast 2 north northwest, on the plane like object  there was a red solid long light on the right wing in front and a blue solid long light on left wing as well as a red flashing light underneath there was no tail light there was also on the back of each wing a solid white light around 9 o'clock i went out and witnessed 3 red and white flashing objects about a mile apart from each other in the skies in a triangle formation heading from east to west i went back out at 10:10 and i seen 2 more red and white flashing light objects heading from east to west i took a couple of pictures then i went back out at about 11 and witnessed a couple more white and red flashing objects moving from west 2 east as well as a solid red light moving through the sky from west to east with a white pulsating light the red light did not blink did not go out at all eventually it faded out i am attaching photos at 10:10 the last two photos were taken around 10:55 i have all of the original pictures to get a closer look of the object i had to zoom in after i took the pictures to look at them closer i did not use a flash and i did not take the picture zoomed in i only attached a few pictures
content.summary: I seen several different flashing objects between 7 and 11 but was all seen within 5 minutes of each other at four different times

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:00 pm i was standing in the front yard,with my seven year old son. we were looking west,toward lax, the landing strips are 1.9 miles from us. my son said "daddy,what's that?" i observed a large orange ball moving from south to north at approximately 2 o clock in the sky(65 degrees) i said," that's just a plane with a con trail". the object then accelerated and turned brilliant white. i said "oh no it's not, look!" at this point the object appeared to "blossom"? bright white and then a spiraling vortex appeared with complete blackness in the middle. it looked very much like the spiral over norway in 2010, but on a smaller scale. then a bright white pinpoint like object came out of the center of the black hole and continued northward. this object had a solid looking white egg shaped cloud trailing it. rather suddenly the cloud turned a brilliant aqua blue color and the cloud seemed to envelop the white pin point of light that preceded it. cloud and object continued northward and began to fade,eventually fading out. this whole part of the process took about three minutes, which is really long, but we observed the object before it displayed any odd characteristics for at least 45 seconds to a minute. the blue aura remained after the object faded out, and eventually became indistinct at about 6:08.I had a cell phone without a video camera, just a still camera, and the phone malfunctioned repeatedly as i tried to take pictures of the vortex. eventually i got one still photo of the white pinpoint object after the vortex disappeared. there were multiple witnesses across the street and one of them captured some video. i have their contact info and they are willing to also share their experience.
 i waited over 24 hours to file this report because i took detailed notes last night and i wanted to do some research. none of the videos i have seen on youtube captured the spiraling vortex part of the phenomena or the initial brilliant aqua blue color burst. this event was reported on local news stations ktla,channel 5 and nbc$-la before 6:30, both reporting at that time that even norad did not know what it was. both lax and ontario airports were shut down briefly after this event. by 7:53 pm & maybe before the flight patterns over lax had been changed or diverted. by this morning(11/08/15) the navy said they had conducted a secret test and fired a three stage trident missile from a nuclear sub and detonated it over los angeles international airport, one of the busiest airports in the nation at 6:00 pm on a saturday evening,with no prior warning or notification. i spoke to a former navy employee today who informed me that this is not navy protocol, and it sounds like a concocted cover story. later today the navy stated that they had forewarned lax of military exercises and that flight patterns had been changed since mid week. i know this information to be false. i live about 1.9 miles from the landing strips @ lax and i observe the skies every night. flight patterns were not changed until after this event last night, sometime between 6:08 and 7:53 pm.
 this event was seen from san francisco to san diego. if the military was going to conduct secret explosions in restricted air space over the second busiest airport in the nation, why would they do it at 6:00 pm on a saturday evening, one of the busiest travel times at that airport? did they want everyone to see it? that's not very secret is it? why not on a tuesday at 9:00 pm? are military officials exploding bombs that open strange spiral looking vortexs and emit massive luminescent blue gas clouds over huge populated areas? if this was a secret missile test,it is certainly no longer secret and all the navy would need to do was release time stamped video of the missile launching from the sub. certainly they are in possession of such video if this is not a cover story,after the fact, for a massive multiple witness sighting of a truly extraordinary aerial phenomena.
  finally, considering the proximity of this event to lax, i would expect that there would have to be multiple professional pilots who witnessed all or more of what i have described above and would hope that mufon attempts to locate these witnesses. as much as i hope no one possesses weapons that do what i describe above; i would be perfectly happy to be proven incorrect in my belief that this was and is an unidentified flying object sighting.
content.summary: Object 1st appeared as glowing orange ball w/ con trail.Turned brilliant white and then swirling white with black hole in middle.Pinpoint of white light emerged from hole,etc.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at school with my friends doing an after school activity. it was a perfect weather day. clear blue sky with singular clouds here and there. i was minding my own business and randomly look up into the sky. that's when i saw a circular disk object(saucer). it was flying from a white cloud across the clear blue sky into another white cloud. only blue surrounding this cloud. i stared at the cloud for a solid 2 minutes. it never came out of the cloud. the object was a dull grey color. i only saw the bottom of it. the bottom of the craft had a large dome like window in the center. then smaller like windows equally spaced around the larger centered one. it flew at a steady pace, had to be less than 100mph. i had direct eye contact on the object for 8 seconds.I studied it. no noise or lights came from it. i saw this saucer object in clear daylight. it did not whatsoever look like a helicopter or airplane. i've always been interested in ufo's and when i saw this it set my curiosity in stone. i was 100% sober at this time. i know what i saw. it was a saucer. that never came out of that white cloud. i stood there for minutes looking at the cloud it went into. never once came out. i tried to get my friend to see it but it was too late. i was excited when i saw it. there was nothing that could of made a reflection in my eye or anything like that. no cell towers near. nothing. just clear sky with a few clouds. it was a ufo!
content.summary: Flew from one cloud to another and never came out of the single small cloud.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for a cigarette at 9:30, was looking at the stars when i saw what i thought to be an airplane. noticed it seemed to be moving slower than normal.It had two solid lights with one blinking in the middle.There were two other airplanes that flew into my view heading west ,they both flew into and out of view while this one still moved slowly, then it stopped for 45 seconds to a full minute. i told my wife and daughter that they should come see it, my daughter came out, said it was cold and was probably just an airplane. at this time it started moving again and slowly faded from view heading west.
content.summary: Two liights with flashing middle flew straight then stopped and hovered for 45 sec - min

content.detailedDescription:
At 7pm pst i went out to the front of the house for a smoke. i noticed
 very bright red orange lights in the eastern sky. the leading lights 
 appeared to be in a formation that resembled the big dipper and were followed by multiple other lights. these had no formation but some were
 in groups of three, others were single objects. they kept coming into   
 view from the east heading north.(they turned toward the north) i called
 my wife to come outside quick. she came out and witnessed the very strange show in the sky. there must have been over 20 of these lights
 and as they turned north they got dimmer. some of the trailing lights descended and a few seemed to stand still and others passed them. we have no idea what they could have been .They weren't flares or lanterns or drones. they seemed too big to be any of those. we are totally at a loss.
 i would think that an aerial display of this duration and size must have been noticed by others in the area of henderson.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orange lights in the eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
Outside, waiting on neighbor and noticed a small moving white light to the southwest, on a bearing slightly north of due east. i next noticed the apparent speed of the object; much faster than other local traffic. there was a red light flashing about two times per second. 

i was about to dismiss the sighting when the object made an abrupt shift to the left. two more similar shifts were observed, maintaining it's original direction of flight, before losing sight as it moved behind a tree. changing my position, i found the object. stationary. the flashing red light , after two more flashes, stopped. 

after a short exchange with my neighbor, 15-20 seconds, the object could not be found by me; neither along the original path nor in the immediate area. 

if the lights were of similar size of those of a commercial jet, the distance would have been 4-5 miles. the speed would have been 2-3 times that of other local commercial traffic. 

there was no sound, before, during or after.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Much faster than known craft

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of my house at 6 pm pst and saw object in the sky with a long beam of light trailing it and i took a picture. we were facing southwest and it was moving to the west.
content.summary: Coming out of my house and saw object in the sky with a long beam of light and i took a picture

content.detailedDescription: Friend of mine captured these images of two different craft,these are two good not to be looked at by a professional. he didn't want to take the time to submit them.
content.summary: This sighting was actually observed by a friend of mine,he didn't want to take the time to report it so i am,the photos he captured need to be looked at by professionals.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road and saw this in the sky drove around the block and took the pictures and video.  the pictures do not come in as clear as we saw.  it was bright and white that brightens up the whole area and hovered.  a red light flashed from it and other colors circled fast.  it was in a disk shape and was too large to be an airplane and too bright yo be a star.
content.summary: Driving home and saw this bright in the sky.  watched it for about 10 minutes in 2 different areas.  pictures did not come out but looking like clouds and the light. the video shows more.  if you zoom in you can see sll of the colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Throwing trash away
noise
plane
bright orange light spinning then took off
scared light headed
took off
content.summary: Bright orange light spinnin around above me then once i looked at it it took off

content.detailedDescription: My front door neighbor and i were both kids at the time. i was around 12 and he was a few years older. it was christmas eve and we were sitting on top of my moms beat up oldsmobile on the trunk leaning up against the back windshield looking up at the sky. we were talking while our parents and family were inside enjoying the party. then we started to look straight into the distance, no longer looking upward and ad our conversation continued my neighbor noticed a red light inside my moms car. he was surprised that she had placed an alarm on such a beat up vehicle that wasn't even able to run. at that moment as we were both looking inside the car he turned around and froze while staeibg up at the sky. i tried to talking to him but he was jot reacting. at that moment i looked up above us and realized that the red light was in actuality a reflection of a giant craft hovering above us. the object was smaller than the roof of my family's 4 bedroom house, but larger than the car we sat atop. i would estimate it was around 20-30ft long and circular in shape. a dull grey colored saucer now hovered over us with a red circular light that shined down upon us. the saucer was close enough to us that i could have stood up on top of the car and touched it. there was no sound, and i knew i'd never seen anything like it in my life. we were unable to move. my neighbor and i were paralyzed, i couldn't scream or yell. i could however look around and see that my friend was not moving either, my eyes were able to move. at the moment i began to pray, as i was raised catholic and thru pure force i was able to disconnect myself from the hold that light had on us and the power was do great that i fell off the car and landed on my knees and hands. at that moment the light was no longer shining a bean on us and my neighbor was able to move, to which he yelled at me to run inside and get help. i ran towards the house, our front lawn was very long and before i reached the door the craft had begun to rise slowly. i was able to see a slight edge to the craft, and nothing else. i ran inside and started telling everyone that there was a ufo outside and that they should come look, but nonone listened. i ran back outside, because no one was paying attention to me and i didn't want to miss what it would do. i ran outside and my neighbor now stood next to the car directly underneath the saucer as it continued to rise high into the air. i ran inside again and no one once again listened, and at this time the craft was so far up in the air that it seemed the size of a basketball. finally my neighbor ran inside and told my family to come see an emergency. as everyone started to come outside the object was now the size of a star and as they stepped outside it sped out horizontally like a shooting star.
content.summary: My neighbor and i were sitting on a car in my driveway when it hovered over us paralyzed us and levitated upward before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving back to austin on 130 i was taking pictures of my speedometer and next i looked up to witness 2 explosions about 10 miles apart. the center of these explosions were a blue orb emitting blue light all around the spheres.. explosion of light! this was really bizzare since the light moved towards the sky and it was visible on the horizon. per the compass in my car i was traveling ne at the time. i wish it would have lasted longer since i had my camera with me at the time.
content.summary: As i was driving back to austin on 130 i was taking pictures of my speedometer and next i looked up to witness 2 explosions about 10 miles apart. the center of these explosions were a blue orb emitting blue light all around the spheres.. explosion of ligh

content.detailedDescription: I saw 2 starlike objects moving extremely fast from south to north.  2nd object would stop and hover when traditional planes went by, then would move again.  looked exactly like stars.
content.summary: 2 star like objects moving extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from minneapolis area after attending a sweat lodge ceremony. i stops in olivia minnesota at 6 pm to get a blizzard at dairy queen then continue driving west on highway 212 when i looked out the passenger side window to the north and noticed what at first i thought was a small airplane flying just above the tree line. i looked again and noticed the windows were too large to be airplane windows.  i could not see any red or green flashing lights at the rear of the craft to identify it as a small airplane. they were long rectangular windows in which i could see people standing and looking out. i grabbed my camera and tried to take a couple pictures.  the craft then made a sharp 90° turn and headed toward me on the front i saw three bright lights. it came at my vehicle above treetop level quite fast and passed over the top of my vehicle and the road and then disappeared to the south. i immediately pulled over to the side of the road and looked for the object in the sky and could not see anything. i could see the lights from other jets and airplanes in the sky but they were a long ways away.
content.summary: Driving home from sweat lodge ceremony saw strange object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor stated he saw the object as he was traveling down veterans memorial blvd. he stated the time was early morning hours. he stated object was hovering over the armstrong's international airport. he said he took three pictures. he further stated that there were others who also observed the object including one man who video taped the object. i had him to send me the pictures in a text. i have some pretty clear pictures that he sent to my phone. clear enough for me to contact mufon and ask if you had any could determine if pictures are a hoax. it is my hope that you will be able to authenticate whether it is actual or if i am the victim of a joke/hoax. i reiterate, i did not see the object. i only have the pictures that he sent me in a text. i have not been able to send the pictures by the methods listed on your form, but i would be more than happy to send you the pictures via text so that you may view and either classify it as a hoax or may need to be further investigated. i only want to know if i am a victim of a hoax or if it could really be an unknown. any help that you could give would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Ufo in picture appeared huge. definitelycouldmakeoutdefinitiveshspe

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, and went outside to have a quick cigarette.  i was looking up, and noticed three lights,. i thought it was three stars, but they were bright.  there were other stars out, but not as bright, nor seemingly as close.  while watching, it turned slowly, but stayed in the same spot?  it was pretty much the same color as the night sky, but i could tell it was triangular in shape, and had a light at each corner.  then all three lights. dimmed, and it was gone!!!   i stayed outside for a few minutes to see if it came back, or to see if it was actually stars, blocked by cloud cover.  it was not, as i could clearly see other stars.  this is not the first time i have seen this.  i just want the truth.  i know what i saw. i'm not crazy,    what is going on ?????
content.summary: I observed what i thought were three(3) stars, rather bright, and was watching it, when it turned in its stationary place.  i realized it had a triangular black shape, with a light at each corner.  it was  the same color as sky, but had a precise shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walkin my wife to her car at 5 am in the parking of our appartnent then as i say goodby i saw it and i said look at this.  she pulled her camera and tried to take photos but it was still dark to get a good photo.  the object had green light around and red light in the center, the light was so bright like i never seen before.  my wife left to work i kept watching the. i went in my place got my phone came back took video and some photos then went back to my place and ever 10 minutes i would go out and look, not moving, last time i looked it moved farther but i still could see it standing still in the new location.
object looked big taking in consideration the distance and it was standing still.  then i went back to my place and i don't know what happened this took about an hour.  first i thought large star but it was too large then i noteced the red light in center.  also there was an airplane flying by so i was able to compare that this thing is stay still and not moving and big and way up there.  when i point my phone on it the camera did not show the red and green ray coming out of the object.  then i was able to see the shape of the object. my feeling is why the governed keeps denying, and why those who are flying this object don't try to contact us and trying to hide.
content.summary: High in space not moving emmeititing red light in center and very strong green light from a tower on the back side causing green light ray all a around it, object looked big taking in consideration the distance and it was standing still my wife saw it too

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were jumping on a trampoline at night and decided to lay down and look at the stars. all of a sudden we both saw what looked like hundreds of stars in a perfect triangle shape. the whole triangle where filled with the star like lights. it appeared to be in space. it looked exactly like stars in the triangle formation. the crazier thing about it was the fact the it crossed the entire expanse of the sky. almost as far as the north was from the south. the object would be the largest thing i have seen in my life. if it were here on earth it would easily cover a large city. it moved from east to west in about 10 seconds with no sound until it left our sight. if it was a ufo it had to be the master mothership. i have never heard any reports of anyone else seeing it nor have i seen anything else from other peoples sightings of something similar. we were 14 at the time and no one believed us.

we were in extreme awe and the first thing we did was get off the trampoline and run down the street trying to see it as long as we could. but it left our sight within a few seconds.
content.summary: Ufo seemed to be in outerspace and took about 10sec to pass by. no sound

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was outside in my hot tub staring into the dusk sky.
 2) i noticed the 3 lights because they were slowly moving across the sky all at the same speed.
3) thought they were bright stars, but they were moving.
4) 3 bright lights in a triangle formation moving slowly 110 degrees east. then all three lights slowly faded away.
5) i thought to myself " wtf?"
60 the three lights that were moving in sync just slowly faded away . at first i thought they went behind some clouds, by there isn't a cloud in the sky.
content.summary: 3 lights travelling slow in a triangle shape then faded away

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor stated he saw the object as he was traveling down veterans memorial blvd. he stated the time was early morning hours. he stated object was hovering over the armstrong's international airport. he said he took three pictures. he further stated that there were others who also observed the object including one man who video taped the object. i had him to send me the pictures in a text. i have some pretty clear pictures that he sent to my phone. clear enough for me to contact mufon and ask if you had any could determine if pictures are a hoax. it is my hope that you will be able to authenticate whether it is actual or if i am the victim of a joke/hoax. i reiterate, i did not see the object. i only have the pictures that he sent me in a text. i have not been able to send the pictures by the methods listed on your form, but i would be more than happy to send you the pictures via text so that you may view and either classify it as a hoax or may need to be further investigated. i only want to know if i am a victim of a hoax or if it could really be an unknown. any help that you could give would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Ufo in picture appeared huge. definitelycouldmakeoutdefinitiveshspe

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck letting my dogs out when i observed 5 orange spheres in a string of pearls configuration in the north.  they appeared to be on the same course traveling east north east at unknown altitude and without any sound.
the 5 spheres broke apart in to 3 groups, 2 spheres slowing down remaining more towards the east while two appeared to drop in altitude towards the east north east.  one sphere, the first one observed in the string of pearl configuration appeared to climb in altitude on a north north east heading.  
the 2 spheres remaining in the north dulled in brightness and disappeared in front of my eyes.  the other group of two did the same thing.  i continued to observe the single sphere in the nne an additional 15 seconds as it was continuing to climb then also disappear.
i was able to take a few pictures after running back inside for my phone.  i caught the two groups as they were starting to disappear as well as the single sphere climbing in altitude.
content.summary: 5 orange spheres

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting outside metrolink station when this bright light came over the building & i heard something in the bushes move i saw some object hoover for serveral minutes w a bright light that pulsated.Then the object took off w no sound.I disagree w the the gov report that it was a missle test what i saw wasn't a missle.
content.summary: Aircraft hovered over building then took off w no sound

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor stated he saw the object as he was traveling down veterans memorial blvd. he stated the time was early morning hours. he stated object was hovering over the armstrong's international airport. he said he took three pictures. he further stated that there were others who also observed the object including one man who video taped the object. i had him to send me the pictures in a text. i have some pretty clear pictures that he sent to my phone. clear enough for me to contact mufon and ask if you had any could determine if pictures are a hoax. it is my hope that you will be able to authenticate whether it is actual or if i am the victim of a joke/hoax. i reiterate, i did not see the object. i only have the pictures that he sent me in a text. i have not been able to send the pictures by the methods listed on your form, but i would be more than happy to send you the pictures via text so that you may view and either classify it as a hoax or may need to be further investigated. i only want to know if i am a victim of a hoax or if it could really be an unknown. any help that you could give would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Ufo in picture appeared huge. definitelycouldmakeoutdefinitiveshspe

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on drive way of my house, i happen to look skyward and a very faint movement caught my eye, it was very small, bright dot directly overhead. i took my camera out and started filming. 
it was very difficult to keep the object in focus on maximum zoom.
my camera is a panasonic dmz-zs40.
when i first saw the object it looked like a florescent plastic bag being carried by the wind, it stayed overhead the entire time moving end over end and changing shapes.
i also noticed a second similar object on video that i could not see initially with the naked eye.
as i was filming the object i had the feeling that what i was seeing was very unusual.
the object kept elevating until i could no longer see it using the camera.
content.summary: Florescent object spotted overhead
